WorkItem.ClosedComment: Nope, this is a bug, and fixed
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I'm trying to automatically map from a nullable enum (public CapacityCode? CapacityCode { get; set; }), to a Nullable byte property.
However, when attempting to do so, I get the following exception:
 
{"Trying to map System.Byte to System.Nullable`1[[x.CapacityCode, x.Core, Version=0.9.80.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]].\nUsing mapping configuration for x.TradeConfirm to x.Models.DTO.TradeConfirmDTO\nDestination property: CapacityCode\nException of type 'AutoMapper.AutoMapperMappingException' was thrown."}
 
Am I missing something here or does this require a custom converter to work?
 
Thanks,
 
Tom
WorkItem.Summary: Map Nullable byte to Nullable Enum
